participant_1.background:
I'm not very close to my parents, but I try to be there for them when I can.
My family works to support my dreams.
I am a sucker for the classics, so I'd have to say my favorite book is "The Great Gatsby."
I went to the beach to relax and spend time with my family.
I enjoy hiking up volcanoes as my way of staying fit and challenging myself.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy making things for my family.
I went to a farm and met a lot of baby animals on my last vacation.
i love mexican food.
my favorite coffee is french vanilla.
i like cupcakes.

content.text: Hi there! What are you up to today?
Not much, just working on this cupcake recipe.
Oh, fun! I love cupcakes. What are you making them for?
My family is coming over for dinner and I wanted to make something special.
That's so sweet of you. I'm sure they'll love them!
Thanks! I hope so. What about you? What are you up to today?
Not much, just trying to relax and catch up on some reading. I'm reading "The Great Gatsby" right now.
Oh, I love that book! It's one of my favorites.
Me too! It's so well-written and the characters are so complex.
I know, right? I love the way Fitzgerald paints such a vivid picture of the Jazz Age.
Yeah, it's really interesting to see how the characters are all affected by the social and economic changes that were happening at the time.
Definitely. It's a really great book.
Yeah, it is. I'm glad I decided to read it.
Me too! I think you'll enjoy it.
I'm sure I will. Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about books.
